# VEHICLE::DISABLE_VEHCILE_DYNAMIC_AMBIENT_SCALES

## Summary
Disable the dynamic update of the ambient scales on a vehicle

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicleIndex: Index of the vehicle.
* **INT** naturalAmbientScale: Value for the natural scale (between 0 and 255)
* **INT** artificialAmbientscale: Value for the artificial scale (between 0 and 255)

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Adds some kind of shadow to the vehicle.

p1 and p2 use values from 0-255 and both make the shadow darker the lower the value is. -1 disables the effect.
